product_name: Aquaglide Cascade Inflatable Stand Up Paddle Board - 10'
long_description: This rugged, inflatable paddle board is extremely stiff and stable with outstanding paddling performance, yet soft and forgiving when bouncing off rocks, car roofs, boat decks and elbows.
short_description: This rugged, inflatable paddle board is extremely stiff and stable with outstanding paddling performance, yet soft and forgiving when bouncing off rocks, car roofs, boat decks and elbows.
